mutants.code:
import heapq

def calculate_daily_melted_snow(N, V, T):
    heap = []
    tmp = 1
    melted_volumes = []
    for i in range(N):
        ans = 0
        heapq.heappush(heap, tmp + V[i])
        while heap and heap[0] <= tmp + T[i]:
            ans += heapq.heappop(heap) - tmp
        tmp += T[i]
        ans += T[i] * len(heap)
        melted_volumes.append(ans)
    return melted_volumes

import heapq

        tmp += T[i]
        ans += T[i] * len(heap)
        melted_volumes.append(ans)
    return melted_volumes

import heapq

def calculate_daily_melted_snow(N, V, T):
    heap = []
    tmp = 0
    melted_volumes = []
    for i in range(N):
        ans = 0
        heapq.heappush(heap, tmp + V[i])
        while heap and heap[1] <= tmp + T[i]:
            ans += heapq.heappop(heap) - tmp
        tmp += T[i]
        ans += T[i] * len(heap)
        melted_volumes.append(ans)
    return melted_volumes
